title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Average attendance about 72778.0 was recorded at Year 2008
Min Average attendance about 63882.0 was recorded at Year 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2017.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
